name: Auto Practice
description: Enables practice mode when entering a level.

enable-auto-practice.name: Enable Auto Practice
enable-auto-practice.description: Toggles auto-practice when starting a level.

show-notification.name: Show Notification
show-notification.description: Whether to show a popup notification when auto-practice is activated.

enable-in-testmode.name: Enable in Test Mode
enable-in-testmode.description: Auto practice will activate when starting a level in test mode.

enable-in-platformer.name: Enable in Platformer Mode
enable-in-platformer.description: Auto practice will activate when starting a level in platformer mode.
